title: Chinese delegation presents cheques to PM for flood affectees
content:
LAHORE, Sep 4 (APP): A delegation of Chinese companies led by China’s Consul General in Pakistan Zhao Shiren called on Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif here Sunday and presented him cheques for the relief and rehabilitation of the flood affectees.
Talking to the Chinese delegation, whose companies had made business investments in Punjab, the PM said the government and people of China never left Pakistan alone in its hour of need.
The friendship of the two countries was higher than the Himalayas and deeper than the ocean, he remarked.“We are always proud of this friend and will remain so in the times to come.”
